examples: His face was reflected in the mirror.
Su rostro se reflejó en el espejo.
She looked into the water and saw her face reflected there.
Ella miró dentro del agua y vio su rostro reflejado allí.
She could see herself reflected in his eyes.
Podía verse reflejada en sus ojos.
The windows reflected the bright afternoon sunlight.
Las ventanas reflejaban la brillante luz del sol de la tarde.
